venue.address_1: Corner of Route 20 and Prospect Street
venue.name: Chuck's Restaurant

item.description: Every Thursday night Chuck's Steakhouse has trivia night. Teams are comprised of roughly six members. An emcee reads the questions, and each team bids a certain number of points with each answer submitted, based on confidence level. Winner receives gift certificates.
item.how_to_find_us: I will give out cell number closer to the event. I also will have a small meetup sign.
item.name: Trivia night at Chuck's
